pages.text: Induction Cells are components in the $(l:multiblocks/induction_matrix)Induction Matrix$(/l). Each cell increases the total energy storage of a Matrix. Note that this does not increase transfer rate; look to the $(l:induction/provider)Induction Providers$(/l) for that.
Adds 8 GJ to the Matrix's capacity
Adds 64 GJ to the Matrix's capacity.
Adds 512 GJ to the Matrix's capacity
Adds 4 TJ to the Matrix's capacity
